00020 #include "searchspace.h"
00021 
00022 namespace CasPlanner
00023 {
00025 SearchSpace::SearchSpace():
00026 searchSpace(NULL)
00027 {
00028 }
00030 SearchSpace::~SearchSpace()
00031 {
00032         SearchSpaceNode *temp;
00033         while (searchSpace != NULL)
00034         {
00035                 temp = searchSpace;
00036                 searchSpace = searchSpace->next;
00037                 delete temp;
00038         };
00039 }
00041 SearchSpaceNode * SearchSpace::insertNode(Point loc)
00042 {
00043         SearchSpaceNode *temp;  
00044         if(nodeExists(loc))
00045                 return NULL;
00046         if (searchSpace == NULL ) // Constructing the ROOT NODE
00047         {
00048                 temp = new SearchSpaceNode;
00049                 temp->location.setX(loc.x());
00050                 temp->location.setY(loc.y());
00051                 temp->obstacle_cost = 0;
00052                 temp->parent   = NULL;
00053                 temp->next     = NULL;
00054                 searchSpace = temp;
00055         }
00056         else
00057         {
00058                 temp = new SearchSpaceNode;
00059                 temp->location.setX(loc.x());
00060                 temp->location.setY(loc.y());
00061                 temp->obstacle_cost = 0;
00062                 temp->parent = NULL; 
00063                 temp->next   = searchSpace;
00064                 searchSpace = temp;
00065         }       
00066         return temp;
00067 }
00069 SearchSpaceNode * SearchSpace::nodeExists(Point loc)
00070 {
00071         SearchSpaceNode *temp = searchSpace;
00072         while (temp != NULL)
00073         {
00074                 if(loc == temp->location)
00075                         return temp;
00076                 temp = temp->next;
00077         }
00078         // node with the given location does not exist
00079         return NULL;
00080 }
00082 bool SearchSpace::removeNode(Point loc)
00083 {
00084         SearchSpaceNode *temp = searchSpace;
00085         while (temp != NULL)
00086         {
00087                 if(loc == temp->location)
00088                 {
00089                         temp->parent->next = temp->next;
00090                         delete temp;
00091                         return true;
00092                 }
00093                 temp = temp->next;
00094         }
00095         // Not found in the list
00096         return false;   
00097 }
00099 void SearchSpace:: freeSearchSpace()
00100 {
00101         SearchSpaceNode *temp;
00102         while (searchSpace != NULL)
00103         {
00104                 temp = searchSpace;
00105                 searchSpace = searchSpace->next;
00106                 delete temp;
00107         };
00108 }
00109 
00110 }
